title: HelloWork Jobs Scraper
description: Fast, stealthy scraper for HelloWork.com jobs. Uses JSON-LD extraction for speed. Provide keyword/location OR a direct search URL.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start from a specific HelloWork search URL. Overrides keyword/location if provided.

keyword.title: Job Keyword
keyword.description: Job title or skill to search for (e.g., 'Software Developer', 'Chef de projet').

collectDetails.title: Collect Job Details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, fetches full job details (description, salary, etc.). Disable for faster URL-only extraction.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of jobs to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum search result pages to crawl.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to avoid blocking. Datacenter proxies work well for HelloWork.
